sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { useExpense } from '../context/ExpenseContext'; const EmployeeDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const { getUserExpenses, expenses } = useExpense(); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalExpenses: 0, pendingExpenses: 0, approvedExpenses: 0, totalAmount: 0 }); const loadDashboardData = useCallback(async () => { await getUserExpenses({ limit: 20 }); }, [getUserExpenses]); useEffect(() => { loadDashboardData(); }, [loadDashboardData]); const calculateStats = useCallback(() => { const totalExpenses = expenses.length; const pendingExpenses = expenses.filter(exp => exp.status === 'PENDING').length; const approvedExpenses = expenses.filter(exp => exp.status === 'APPROVED').length; const totalAmount = expenses.reduce((sum, exp) => sum + exp.amount, 0); setStats({ totalExpenses, pendingExpenses, approvedExpenses, totalAmount }); }, [expenses]); useEffect(() => { if (expenses.length > 0) { calculateStats(); } }, [expenses, calculateStats]); return (
{/* Page Header */}

My Dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.firstName}! Track your expenses and submissions here.

New Expense
{/* Stats Cards */}

{stats.totalExpenses}

Total Expenses

{stats.pendingExpenses}

Pending

{stats.approvedExpenses}

Approved

${stats.totalAmount.toLocaleString()}

Total Amount

{/* Recent Expenses */}
Recent Expenses
View All
{expenses.length > 0 ? (
{expenses.slice(0, 10).map(expense => ( ))}
Title Amount Category Status Date Actions
{expense.title}
{expense.description} 		${expense.amount.toLocaleString()}
{expense.currency} 		{expense.category} {expense.status} {new Date(expense.expenseDate).toLocaleDateString()}
{expense.status === 'PENDING' && ( )}
) : (

No expenses submitted yet

Submit Your First Expense
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}
Quick Actions
Submit New Expense
View All Expenses
Update Profile
); }; export default EmployeeDashboard;
